cause.description:
http://www.azequinerescue.org/
Arizona Equine Rescue Org.'s programs include the rehabilitation of sick or injured horses, adoption program after rehabilitation, working with a local youth and at-risk youth programs to provide skill learning programs, and community outreach/prevention through workshops that educate the public on proper horse care, cost, and commitment prior to or after purchasing a horse and the Horses 4 Healing Program.
1. Help stop equine abuse!!
2. It's important to educate the public on proper horse care!
cause.mission: provide the services of animal rescue and community outreach to aid in the prevention of equine abuse and neglect.
cause.name: Arizona Equine Rescue Organization, Inc.
